head.title: BOLT (BOLT) is a safe, instant and private cryptocurrency.

about.title: The Community
about.paragraph: BOLT has as its main objective the disruption, using Blockchain to make the access of any investor or company in a totally decentralized and globalized way, practically and without bureaucracy.
about.paragraph1: Our cryptocurrency was developed from Litecoin's core (LTC) and we are moving towards becoming independent in the future, with rewritten and improved code. At the moment, Bolt has some solutions such as “Instant Send“, “Private Send“ and “Lightweight Protocol Network“, which aims to keep your network scalable, secure and anti-DDOS.
about.paragraph2: Join our community in a decentralized P2P network, investors make the rules! We encourage POW (Proof of Work) miners to protect BlockChain in addition to the masternodes to validate, store and serve the blockchain for users, keeping our network decentralized and making decisions to make our currency stronger.

specifications.title: Fair distribution
specifications.paragraph1: Our cryptocurrency has the focus on the community giving everyone the opportunity to participate in the project, so we do not make any Premine of the currency, we do not inflate the starting blocks and we do not do any ICO, we want a lasting and stable currency.

faq.title: FAQ
faq.subtitle: Let's help you how to use BOLT

item.title: Overview
item.value: Bolt is a multi-platform digital currency with wallets available for Windows, MacOS, and Linux. Its main goal is the disruption, using the Blockchain to make the access to investors or any company much easier, allowing anyone to send, receive, and mine with just a few clicks, changing how we use our money in a daily basis.

item1.title: The Basics
item1.paragraph: There are three main ways to join our community:
item1.paragraph1: The Wallet – To send and receive funds, and to setup your Masternode in the network.
item1.paragraph2: Proof of Work Mining – Using hash power to validate transactions and create new coins.
item1.paragraph3: Proof of Stake Mining – Being a Masternode: validating, protecting, and helping the community voting for the project decitions - and earning BOLT for this.

item2.title: The Wallets
item2.paragraph: A new Web Wallet is coming soon, making your life easier.
item2.paragraph1: Wallets for Windows, MacOS and Linux → Available here for download.

item3.title: Sending and Receiving BOLT
item3.paragraph: An address is the only thing you need to send or receive the funds. You can get an address using any of the wallets available for download. The BOLT's addresses start always with BT.
item3.paragraph1: Your funds will become available just after you make the transfer. Our system allows you to receive your funds immediately for almost no fee.
item3.paragraph2: The Block Explorer inside the wallet allows you to explore the blocks and the transactions in our Blockchain.

item4.title: Mining
item4.paragraph: The term mining means to validate the transactions and to keep it safe. Miners get coins as a reward for find and validate the blocks.
item4.paragraph1: Bolt has two different ways to validate a transaction: Proof-of-work (PoW) and Proof-of-stake (PoS).
item4.paragraph3: In the Proof-of-work (PoW) mining, the transactions are grouped by blocks. These blocks are validated by the PoW miners. When a block is found, it becomes part of the network.
item4.paragraph4: In order to be a PoW miner, you need to dedicate hash power to the network. Because of this hash power, you get BOLT as a reward.
item4.paragraph5: To be more efficient, miners usually join a mining pool. A pool is a group of miners working together to find a block. It increases your chance of finding a block. When the pool finds a block, the reward is split with all miners of that pool.
item4.paragraph7: Unlike PoW mining, the Proof-of-stake (PoS) mining requires much fewer computer power. The PoS adds an extra layer to the network, allowing the users to become Masternodes (something like a shareholder of a company). To become a Masternode you just need 1000 BOLTs in your wallet and follow the guide → how to set up a masternode. Being a Masternode allows you to be part of the network, voting for the project decisions and to receive rewards for this.

item5.title: Buy and Sell BOLT
item5.paragraph: We are new and, for now, we are not available in exchanges. We are working hard to add BOLT to exchanges as soon as possible.

item6.title: Join the community
item6.paragraph: Be part of the community! The stakeholders decide the future of the project. We give rewards for the PoW miners, for helping us to protect the blockchain, and to the masternodes, helping the network to be decentralized and voting for the project decisions, making our coin even stronger. Join our Telegram group and our channel on Discord. Talk to the developers and to the project managers. Ask any question you might have. We are here to help you. We are also available on Facebook and Twitter as well. Come and join us!
